translation: Humility, unpretentiousness, non-injury, forgiveness, uprightness, service to the teacher, purity, steadfastness, and self-control.
commentary: 13.8 humility humility? unpretentiousness unpretentiousness? non-violence noninjury? Forgiveness forgiveness? Arjavam uprightness? Acharyopasanam service of the teacher? Shaucham purity? Stability steadiness? self-control selfcontrol.Commentary These are the alities that constitute wisdom or lead to wisdom.
